alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:50PM CDT until May 07 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PRAIRIE...SOUTHEASTERN LONOKE...NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Altheimer, or 11 miles northeast of Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Stuttgart... Altheimer... Humphrey... Humnoke... Almyra... Brummitt... Parkers Corner... Madding... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Wabbaseka... Allport... Coy... Sherrill... Gethsemane... Slovak... Almyra Airport... Glenlake... Rob Roy... Tomberlin... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
